fullText: The new production of 'Annie' is a slick, professionally executed revival that hits all the familiar marks without adding anything particularly fresh or memorable to the mix.
dtliExcerpt: The new production of 'Annie' is a slick, professionally executed revival that hits all the familiar marks without adding anything particularly fresh or memorable to the mix.
